name: James Patterson's Women's Murder Club: A Darker Shade of Grey
name_original: James Patterson's Women's Murder Club: A Darker Shade of Grey
description:
James Patterson's Women's Murder Club: A Darker Shade of Grey is a puzzle game developed by Floodlight Games. It came out on 11-03-2009. It was published by Oberon Media.
You can play James Patterson's Women's Murder Club: A Darker Shade of Grey on PC.
